cells.data:
minishift start --cpus 6 --memory=10240 --skip-registration --ocp-tag v3.6.173.0.5

# export MINISHIFT_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL=y
minishift start --cpus 7 --memory 10240 --username kgresch@redhat.com --service-catalog --ocp-tag v3.6.173.0.5
# minishift start --cpus 6 --memory=10240 --iso-url https://github.com/minishift/minishift-centos-iso/releases/download/v1.0.0/minishift-centos7.iso
# minishift start --cpus 6 --memory=10240 --skip-registration => cdk!
# minishift start --cpus 6 --memory=24960 --skip-registration --metrics --ocp-tag v3.6 --logging --ocp-tag v3.6
# minishift start --cpus 6 --memory=10240 --skip-registration --ocp-tag v3.6 --ocp-tag v3.6

# minishift stop --skip-unregistration
# --logging --ocp-tag v3.5

oc login -u system:admin
oc project default
oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin admin
# oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin developer
# Gogs default creds are either gogsadmin/admin123 or gogsadmin/RedHat$1 (fabric8) or gogs/password (cicd demo)
